languages.text: The Warrior's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} gains +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} damage and ignores {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Every enemy who survives an attack enhanced by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} will attack the Warrior in return, including creatures with ranged weapons.
languages.original_text: Следующая атака воина в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} получает +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% к {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитию брони{/g} и наносит на {uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} больше урона, а также игнорирует {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g} цели. Все противники, включая существ с дистанционным оружием, которые выжили, став целями атаки, усиленной этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностью{/g}, атакуют воина в ответ.

traits.locale_text: The Fighter's next melee attack gains +<u>5×(STR Bonus)%</u> to Armour Penetration and +<u>2×(STR Bonus)</u> to Damage and ignores <u>3×(WS Bonus)</u> of the target's Parry. Every enemy who survives the attack enhanced by this ability attacks the Fighter back, including creatures with ranged weapons.

The Fighter's next melee attack gains +<u>5×(STR Bonus)%</u> to Armor Penetration and +<u>2×(STR Bonus)</u> to Damage and ignores <u>3×(WS Bonus)</u> of the target's Parry. Every enemy who survives an attack enhanced by this ability will attack the Fighter in return, including creatures with ranged weapons.

The Fighter's next melee attack gains +<u>5×(STR Bonus)%</u> to Armour Penetration and +<u>2×(STR Bonus)</u> to Damage and ignores <u>3×(WS Bonus)</u> of the target's Parry. Every enemy who survives an attack enhanced by this ability will attack the Fighter in return, including creatures with ranged weapons.

The Fighter's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} gains +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} damage and ignores {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Every enemy who survives an attack enhanced by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} will attack the Fighter in return, including creatures with {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons.

The Warrior's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} gains +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} damage and ignores {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Every enemy who survives an attack enhanced by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} will attack the Warrior in return, including creatures with ranged weapons.

languages.text: Следующая атака воина в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} получает +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% к {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитию брони{/g} и наносит на {uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} больше урона, а также игнорирует {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g} цели. Все противники, включая существ с дистанционным оружием, которые выжили, став целями атаки, усиленной этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностью{/g}, атакуют воина в ответ.
languages.original_text: The Fighter's next melee attack gains +<u>5×(STR bonus)%</u> armour penetration and +<u>2×(STR bonus)</u> damage and ignores <u>3×(WS bonus)%</u> of the target's parry. Every enemy who survives an attack enhanced by this ability will attack the Fighter in return, including creatures with ranged weapons.

traits.locale_text: Следующая атака воина в ближнем бою получает +<u>5×(бонус СИЛ)%</u> к пробитию брони и наносит +<u>2×(бонус СИЛ)</u> урона, а также игнорирует <u>3×(бонус ББ)%</u> парирования цели. Все противники, включая существ с дальнобойным оружием, которые выжили, став целями атаки, усиленной этой способностью, атакуют воина в ответ.

Следующая атака воина в ближнем бою получает +<u>5×(бонус СИЛ)%</u> к пробитию брони и наносит +<u>2×(бонус СИЛ)</u> урона, а также игнорирует <u>3×(бонус ББ)%</u> парирования цели. Все противники, включая существ с дальнобойным оружием, которые выжили, став целями атаки, усиленной этой способностью, атакуют воина в ответ.

Следующая атака воина в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} получает +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% к {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитию брони{/g} и наносит +{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} урона, а также игнорирует {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g} цели. Все противники, включая существ с {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дальнобойным{/g} оружием, которые выжили, став целями атаки, усиленной этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность.{/g}, атакуют воина в ответ.

languages.text: 战士下次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}提高{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}%，造成的伤害提高{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}点，同时无视目标{uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}%的{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}。然而，若此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}强化过的攻击未能击杀目标，则所有未能击杀的目标都会对战士进行反击，包括使用远程武器的敌人。
languages.original_text: The Warrior's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} gains +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} damage and ignores {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Every enemy who survives an attack enhanced by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} will attack the Warrior in return, including creatures with ranged weapons.

traits.locale_text: 战士的下次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}提高<u>（5×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%，造成的伤害提高<u>（2×力量加值）</u>，同时无视目标<u>（3×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}加值）</u>%的{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}。若此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}未能击杀目标，则所有存活下来的敌人都会对战士进行反击，包括使用{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器的敌人。

战士的下次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}提高{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}%，造成的伤害提高{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}，同时无视目标{uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}%的{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}。若此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}未能击杀目标，则所有存活下来的敌人都会对战士进行反击，包括使用{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器的敌人。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}下次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}提高{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}%，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}点，同时无视目标{uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}%的{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}。然而，若此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}强化过的攻击未能击杀目标，则所有未能击杀的目标都会对战士进行反击，包括使用{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器的敌人。

languages.text: El próximo{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary} ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del guerrero gana un +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}, +{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} al daño e ignora un {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} % de la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} del objetivo. Todo enemigo que sobreviva a un ataque mejorado por esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} responderá atacando al guerrero, incluidas las criaturas provistas de armas a distancia.
languages.original_text: The Warrior's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} gains +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} damage and ignores {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Every enemy who survives an attack enhanced by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} will attack the Warrior in return, including creatures with ranged weapons.

traits.locale_text: El próximo {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del guerrero gana un +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}, +{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} e ignora un {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} % de la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} del objetivo. Todo enemigo que sobreviva a un ataque mejorado por esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} responderá atacando al guerrero, incluidas las criaturas provistas de armas {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}.

El próximo {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del guerrero gana un +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}, un +{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} al daño e ignora un {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} % de la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} del objetivo. Todo enemigo que sobreviva a un ataque mejorado por esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} responderá atacando al guerrero, incluidas las criaturas provistas de armas {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}.

languages.text: Der nächste {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} des Kriegers erhält +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und + {uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} Schaden und ignoriert {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} % der {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g} des Ziels. Jeder Feind, der einen durch diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} verstärkten Angriff überlebt, greift den Krieger im Gegenzug an, einschließlich Kreaturen mit Fernkampfwaffen.
languages.original_text: The Warrior's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} gains +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} damage and ignores {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Every enemy who survives an attack enhanced by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} will attack the Warrior in return, including creatures with ranged weapons.

traits.locale_text: Der nächste {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} des Kriegers erhält +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und + {uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und ignoriert {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} % der {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g} des Ziels. Jeder Feind, der einen durch diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} verstärkten Angriff überlebt, greift den Krieger im Gegenzug an, einschließlich Kreaturen mit {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfwaffen{/g}.

Der nächste {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} des Kämpfers erhält +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und +{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} Schaden und ignoriert {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% der {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g} des Ziels. Jeder Gegner, der einen durch diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} verstärkten Angriff überlebt, greift den Kämpfer im Gegenzug an, einschließlich Kreaturen mit {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfwaffen{/g}.

languages.text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} suivante du guerrier bénéficie de +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} et +{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} points de dégâts, et elle ignore {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} % de la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} de la cible. Tout ennemi qui survit à une attaque améliorée par cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}, y compris les créatures équipées d'armes à distance, contre-attaque le guerrier.
languages.original_text: The Warrior's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} gains +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} damage and ignores {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Every enemy who survives an attack enhanced by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} will attack the Warrior in return, including creatures with ranged weapons.

traits.locale_text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} suivante du Combattant bénéficie de +<u>(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FOR{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} et +<u>(2 × bonus de FOR)</u> points de dégâts, et elle ignore <u>(3 × bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}CA{/g})</u> % de la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} de la cible. Tout ennemi qui survit à une attaque boostée par cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} attaque le Combattant en retour, y compris les créatures équipées d'armes {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}.

L'{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} suivante du Combattant bénéficie de +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} et +{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} points de dégâts, et elle ignore {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} % de la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} de la cible. Tout ennemi qui survit à une attaque boostée par cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} attaque le Combattant en retour, y compris les créatures équipées d'armes {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}.

languages.text: ファイターの次の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}が+{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を得てダメージが+{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}増加し、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}を{uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}%無視する。この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}によって強化された攻撃で倒れなかった敵はすべて、レンジウェポンを持つ敵も含めてファイターに反撃する。
languages.original_text: The Warrior's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} gains +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} damage and ignores {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Every enemy who survives an attack enhanced by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} will attack the Warrior in return, including creatures with ranged weapons.

traits.locale_text: ファイターの次の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}が+{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を得てダメージが+{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}増加し、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}を{uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}%無視する。この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}によって強化された攻撃で倒れなかった敵はすべて、レンジウェポンを持つ敵も含めてファイターに反撃する。

ファイターの次の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}が+{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を得てダメージが+{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}され、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}を{uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}%無視する。この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}によって強化された攻撃で生き延びた敵はすべて、{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}武器を持つ敵も含めてファイターに反撃する。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}の次の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}が+{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を得て{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}され、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}を{uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}%無視する。この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}によって強化された攻撃で生き延びた敵はすべて、{g|Encyclopedia:Range}レンジ{/g}ウェポンを持つ敵も含めてファイターに反撃する。

languages.text: Savaşçı'nın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g}, +%{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değeri kazanır ve +{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} daha fazla hasar verir. Ayrıca hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerinin %{uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} kadarını yok sayar. Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} ile güçlendirilmiş bir saldırıdan sağ kurtulan düşman (menzilli silaha sahip yaratıklar da dâhil), Savaşçı'ya karşı saldırı yapar.
languages.original_text: The Warrior's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} gains +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} damage and ignores {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Every enemy who survives an attack enhanced by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} will attack the Warrior in return, including creatures with ranged weapons.
